subtitle.track1: how did you celebrate this Spring Festival
subtitle.track2: 你这个新年是怎么过的
subtitle.track3: nǐ zhè gè xīnnián shì zěnme guò de

subtitle.track1: oh I went back home, and celebrated it together with my parents
subtitle.track2: 啊我回了家，跟我父母一起过的
subtitle.track3: ā wǒ huíjiā le, gēn wǒ fùmǔ yīqǐ guò de

subtitle.track1: did you have a good time
after we had New Year's Eve Dinner together
subtitle.track2: 我们一起在家吃了年夜饭后
subtitle.track3: wǒmen yīqǐ zài jiā chī le niányèfàn hòu

subtitle.track1: we watched the Spring Festival Gala on China Central Television
subtitle.track2: 看了中央台的春节联欢晚会
subtitle.track3: kàn le zhōngyāngtái de chūnjié liánhuān wǎnhuì

subtitle.track1: I especially enjoyed the cross-talks and short plays
subtitle.track2: 我尤其喜欢相声和小品
subtitle.track3: wǒ yóuqí xǐhuān xiàngsheng hé xiǎopǐn

subtitle.track1: did you go anywhere to travel
subtitle.track3: nǐmen qù nǎlǐ lǚyóu le ma?

subtitle.track1: after we visited some family members on the first day
subtitle.track2: 我们大年初一看望了一些家人后
subtitle.track3: wǒmen dànián chūyī kànwàng le yīxiē jiārén hòu

subtitle.track1: we travelled to Hong Kong on the second day
subtitle.track2: 大年初二就一起去了香港旅游
subtitle.track3: dànián chūèr jiù yīqǐ qù le xiānggǎng lǚyóu

subtitle.track1: the atmosphere of the Spring Festival is also quite a lot, isn't it
subtitle.track3: chūnjié de qìfen yě hěn nóng ba

subtitle.track1: there were dragon-dancing and lion-dancing at many places
subtitle.track2: 很多地方都有舞龙舞狮表演
subtitle.track3: hěnduō dìfang dōu yǒu wǔlóng wǔshī biǎoyǎn
zhēn bùcuò, zhēn jiào rén xiànmu

subtitle.track1: why how did you celebrate it
subtitle.track2: 怎么 你是怎么过的
subtitle.track3: zěnme nǐ shì zěnme guò de

subtitle.track1: oh I had too much work
I celebrated it all by myself in the lab
subtitle.track2: 我是一个人在实验室里过的
subtitle.track3: wǒ shì yī gè rén zài shíyànshì lǐ guò de

subtitle.track1: you come to my place this weekend
subtitle.track3: zhè gè zhōumò nǐ lái wǒ jiā
